item.description:
SAVE THE DATE: MAY 19th
For Another Exciting & Educational NHCCS Dinner Conference...
"Constitutional Homeland Security: A Nation In Arms"Don't Miss Out ~ Register Today
With...
Brian Tilton, as Emcee

And Featuring...
Dr. Edwin Vieira, Jr.
"State Militias: The Constitutional Mandate for Safe Homeland Security"

Also with...
Constitutional Attorney Joseph Bartozzi
"The 2nd Amendment vs. The United States Supreme Court"

& More...

Registration $59.95 pp / Includes Plated Dinner and All Events
pre-registration is requiredGrappone Conference Center ~ Concord, NH
Sunday, May 19th ~ 4:00 PM to 7:30 PM
Doors Open at 3:00 PM for Check-in & Socializing

"Today revitalization of the Militia is requisite more than ever before.

Although 'the Militia of the several States' were 'forms' with which the Founding Fathers---indeed all
Americans of that era--were familiar, today they are almost entirely inactive and even forgotten. And even the noun
'militia' has been saddled with an unsavory connotation in common discourse. Therein lies the danger: For the evils against
which the constitutional Militia should be arrayed never sleep. And the protections which the constitutional Militia
should provide are always necessary. Yet while the evils daily assault America, the protections are denied her."
_Dr. Edwin Vieira, Jr.


Register Online Today: http://www.nhccs.org/May19th-Registration.htm

Or call 603-679-2444 to register by phone.
Seating is pre-assigned based on date of registration to the extent possible.
For best seating register early.

We Accept: VISA / MasterCard / AMEX / Discover/ PayPal/ Your Check
Organizations wishing display/table space should call 603-679-2444
Registrations Close May 14, 2013 - No Refunds
item.name: "Constitutional Homeland Security: A Nation In Arms"
